recaps.1: Rincewind and Twoflower fall through space after their encounter with Fate and The Lady, while the red star approaches the Disc. The eighth Great Spell in Rincewind's head becomes increasingly restless as cosmic forces gather.
recaps.2: The heroes land safely and begin their journey across the Disc. They encounter various dangers while the red star grows brighter in the sky, causing magical disturbances across the land.
recaps.3: Rincewind and Twoflower meet Cohen the Barbarian, an elderly but still formidable warrior. Together they face bandits and other perils while the cosmic crisis continues to build.
recaps.4: The group encounters druids preparing for ritual sacrifice and rescues Bethan from becoming their victim. Cohen demonstrates his heroic skills despite his advanced age, while the red star's approach affects magic worldwide.
recaps.5: Pursued by Herrena and her mercenary band, the heroes continue their journey. The magical disruptions caused by the approaching red star become more severe and widespread.
recaps.6: Death and other anthropomorphic personifications observe the unfolding crisis. The heroes face various challenges while the fabric of reality itself begins to show strain from the cosmic approach.
recaps.7: The group encounters trolls and other magical creatures affected by the cosmic disturbances. The red star's influence grows stronger, causing increasing chaos in the magical world.
recaps.8: At Unseen University, the wizards become aware of the approaching crisis. Galder Weatherwax and his colleagues, including Trymon, discuss the need to gather all eight Great Spells to save the Disc.
recaps.9: Trymon reveals his ambition to control the Great Spells for himself. The crisis at the university intensifies as the red star's approach threatens the very structure of reality.
recaps.10: Rincewind arrives at Unseen University where the Octavo reveals its consciousness. The Great Spells demand to be spoken together to prevent cosmic disaster, but Trymon seeks to control them.
recaps.11: Trymon's attempt to control the Great Spells goes wrong, opening doorways to the Dungeon Dimensions. The Things from outside reality attempt to enter the world as the cosmic crisis reaches its peak.
recaps.12: The eight Great Spells are finally spoken together, saving the Disc from destruction. The red star reveals its true nature and purpose, and cosmic balance is restored through the heroic actions of the unlikely adventurers.
